## CaseStats interface

An object of stats including mean, margin or error, and standard deviation.  https://benchmarkjs.com/docs\#prototype\_stats

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface CaseStats extends Stats 
```
<b>Extends:</b> Stats
